content.detailedDescription:
Witness was near marshalltown on west main road, one mile west of town, driving east toward the town. she had gone down a hill, and above the next hill saw a cigar-shaped object traveling in the sky about 15 degrees high, south to north across the road, perhaps 4-5 miles away. it was bright silver and slightly larger at the north end than at the south end. it was outlined against clouds, although the sun was shining on the witness. there was a microwave relay tower in the foreground that provided a scale to the object, since the object was the same angular diameter as the tower top, which was later measured to be 3/4 of a degree. the tower was one mile away, and the cigar-shaped object was slightly to the right and looked to be well behind the tower. there were two smaller dark clouds in front of the background clouds. the dark clouds looked to be over the west edge of marshalltown, which would put them 4-5 miles away. when first seen, the object was stationary, but then abruptly fell to half of its height and entered into one of the clouds, going to the north. it reappeared out of the other cloud and proceeded to the north until it was lost from view. she was surprised and realized it was not an airplane. being a scientist and knowing about ufos, she realized that this was one.The witness said that she immediately checked to see if this could be a possible reflection in the windshield, but ruled it out.    
the witness and investigators visited the site and took measurements on the tower. the object was 0.75 degrees long, and if it was at a distance of 4 1/2 miles it would have been 300 feet long.We called the sheriff���s office, which had no reports of ufos that day. we called the newspaper, and they also had no reports of ufos. i ran a planetarium computer program, and this showed that there was a one day old crescent moon to the right of the sighted object. also the planets mercury, saturn, and mars were in that area. however, that area of the sky was completely obscured by clouds, and the objects would not have been bright enough to see during the daytime. the object was a bright silver with no markings and could not have been a helicopter, since it dropped too fast at the first of the sighting. no sound was heard, but the car windows were closed and the air conditioner on.

the witness is fifty-two, is well-educated as a scientist, objective, analyatical, and skeptical. she wishes to remain anonymous. she had a previous sighting approximately 1999 by nevada, ia, of a gold pillar of light in the sky with orbs around it. this was reported to and investigated by mufon and turned out to be very near a crop circle site that had also been investigated. she is knowledgeable about ufos and has believed in their reality for quite a few years before the most recent sighting. she has attended local ufo meetings and after her sighting immediately called the former mufon state dirctor, who is a friend of hers.
it is the investigator���s opinion that the witness did see a cigar-shaped object low in the sky, drop down and then proceed through two dark clouds. it seemed that other people should have noticed the object over the town, but such is not always the case.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witness driving up a hill & noticed a cigar-shaped silver object , no markings. 3/4° long. it dropped straight down to 500 feet  & continued north through a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Call me or email me
content.summary: 3 ufos  made 2 formation a diagonal line and a triangle, video taped them , looked like rings

content.detailedDescription: In august 1967 [i think] while in the la. national guard while on the 2 weeks in fort chaffee arkansas  several people reported lights in the sky to the north. while i didn't see anything the first time looking out the back door. the second time around a few minutes later people were talking and looking about the lights. since i didn't see anything the first time i stayed in my bunk. the next day  newspaper and on the radio kept on about lights in the night sky. i wish to this day i would have gone back to look.
content.summary: Seen by others

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking into our apartment, i noticed a glint in the sky.  having recently seen a strange object over the lake nearby, i decided to stop and take a closer look. i also had my digital camera with me, so i took it out and began taking pictures of the object. the object did not leave a con trail, and i did not hear the usual sound that jets make as they pass over-head.  the object moved in a straight line, as can be depicted by the pictures that i took, from the south-western horizon towards the north-eastern horizon, where it went behind a cloud.  i did not feel any strange reactions to the object, or observe any abnormal reactions in the area around me throughout the duration of the event.
content.summary: Small disc shaped object moved across the south-western sky and into a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
"my dog has a habit of wanting to take a quick turn  outside in the middle of the night, so when he awoke me at about 2:30 this morning, i took him out. his run  opens out from the back of the garage, so all i had to do was open the door, and out he went. he does not run  loose. i stood waiting on him when i noticed a quick flash of light up on  the hill south of my house near my storage shed up there. the yard lights do not reach up that far, and it was pitch black where the light occurred. at first i thought of fireflies, but it was too large. i kept watching, and in a few seconds  it appeared again, only down the hill a bit toward the house. it appeared to be a solid light about a foot high, and perhaps an inch across. it flashed on about a second or two, then off, as before. it was moving down the hill about an estimated 10 feet at a time, and about 5 or 6 feet off the ground. this same thing happened 6 or 7 times until it was about 15 feet from the house, when it turned to the right of me, and took off into the woods. it flashed once as it turned, then i didn���t see it again, although i stood and looked for maybe ten minutes.

i have heard of rods, but their descriptions seem somewhat different, but that is what came to my mind. if it was an insect of some sort, i would surely dislike meeting it head-on.

one thing i noticed was that its path was almost in a straight line. it did not waver from side to side, or up and down, as perhaps an insect would. its height off the ground also remained about the same.

no sound was apparent, and my dog did not give any indication of anything unusual. he is normally very good about hearing or smelling anything out of the ordinary."
content.summary: Flashing rod light  1 ft. long approached witness down small hill. at 15 ft. turned 90° moved away.

content.detailedDescription:
I really have no recollection of anything which occured...All i know is i have a photogragh.
there is a massive time loss, i ahve these dreams, nightmares.
i have taken several objects from mmy body, coughed something up...Kept it, its not a natural shape, fells like wood/metal.
the man from shadow research does not return any of my calls, i think he disbelieves me.
i need someone to talk to about this, as soon as possible.
they come every now and again, do things.
i sometimes remember, but want to forget.
i need someone to contact me.
-----------------------------------------------
the photo looks as though it was taken over at nellis or groom lake. an abondoned road, or air strip. there is a night construction light on, next to an old abandoned building on the far right of the photogragh.
to the far left is a four orbed object with a tail, translucent, ever since then i ahve these dreams.
i have done things to riun relationships that is not me.
i have waken up with bruises, marks, red inhection holes on my forehead, side of head, and other parts of my body.
i have enclosed my photograph.
content.summary: Memory loss...I have a photogragh.

content.detailedDescription:
The three of us were sitting on the deck which is connected to the house,and as i looked up i seen this round thing and it was keeping up to the plane,right behind it,it was 6 pm and i'm sure it wasn't a balloon,never seen a balloon or a bird keep up to a plane we don't know what it was but it sure wasn't a balloon.
  i guess we watched it about 1 minute then it stopped then it went straight up and disappeared.
content.summary: Three of us were sitting on the deck and i looked up and seen this airplane and right behind it was this circle which kept up to the speed of the plane then it stopped then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i along with my sister and brother were driving north on an intersecting divided 4 lane highway that connects i-95 and i-81. we returning from south carolina after seeing my sister in the hospital, she died nov, 24,1981 shortly after our return to ny.I know it was the last part of oct or 1st part of nov because my wife and i were riding in the back seat and looking at the full moon and the date of my sisters death. my brother was driving and sister was napping in the front passanger seat, my wife and i were in the back. it was very early in the morning as the moon was high and very bright as it was a crystal clear night, i beleive the moon was to our left and up as you look up & out the rear window. as i was observing the moon and how it ilumminated a very round mountain down in the valley to our right, you could make out terrain features in the light, i noticed a firey comet like object approaching from behind us and up the small valley. i told my wife to look quick and she observed it pass behind the round mountain and up the valley. it was a classic war of the worlds type firey commet, long white tail, etc. it was bright enough that it illuninated the round mountain it went behind and the one on the otherside of the small valley, you could see the color of the trees as it passed into the valley. we expected to see an impact flash or fire or something as it passed just behind the round mountain but it just dissipeared as if a door had opened and swallowed it up. it came in at about a 15 to 20 angle to the earth and staight up the little valley, no waver or adjustment to its path. at that angle it seemed almost parrell to the valley floor and looked like it was sure to hit that little round mountain & explode. but it was just like it was swallowed up and the like was shut off like a switch. my brother did not see it as he had been driving for along time and it happend so fast, 2 or 3 seconds and the occurance started to our immedieate right rear and ended to our immedieate right. it was a full moon there was no other traffic on the road,seemed like uninhabted country side, observing the full moon i observed no aircract and the little mountain was only 1 mile +/_ 1/2 mile away. the firey object was so big i thought it was the end of the world, a very very large house sized object. my sister slept through the whole thing. we did not stop and my brother just thought my wife and i were a little nuts or tired from the trip, we know what we saw. its been alot of years but my wife and i have always wanted to seek out the location once again & walk back into that little valley to see whats there or whats up back there that could hide something the size of that fire ball, old war of the worlds type fire ball not the tom cruise one. i watched the news for any reports after that but saw nothing and did not know who to report it to, but have always wondered.
content.summary: My wife & i observed a large house sized fireball be swallowed up by mountain in va. with no apparent impact flash. as if it swallowed it up.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed and as i sat down on the bed i rolled to the other side near my alarm clock and glanced out the window. it was a clear night and i saw the above-described object travel from the right side of my window to the left.  the tall tree in the yard is sparse and i could easily see it pass behind it in the sky.  the shape was very unusually and unnerving. very large, very bright shaped like an irregular tear drop with somewhat of an extention behind it. very bizarre!
content.summary: Bright white lit solid looking object on a nw to se trajectry

content.detailedDescription: I saw one alien in1955 outside of my house for 2 miutes aprox.He was 4 to 5ft. dark gray thin legs and arms and very big head big eyes and no hair ,i was so terrorized speechless,at that time iwas living with my granparents outside of del rio tx. city limits ,one night before a lot  of people witnessed severeal ufos over laughling air force 6miles east of del rio tx.My family included...I have seen too  many ufos all my life in del rio area,i said nothing because nobody is going to beliveme
content.summary: 3 ufos were above my house approx.1000ft.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was flying to minneapolis from southeast .
2. i was looking out of the airplane window at the clouds.
3. i had no idea  what the object might possibly be.
4. object was flat black in color , very large (best est.300-400 yards long) and featureless , it remained still in the top of a cloud.
5. feelings of disbelief , awe ,and strangely; very calm.
6. lost sight of the object when the plane finally had flown past the point of seeing anymore from my window.
content.summary: Black rectangle in cloud over chicago area ,sighted from above

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single star morphs into hoberman sphere, rotates, reverts, turns red, divides, flies away in formation

content.detailedDescription: I am a member of mufon but was not looking for discs. i had this photo stored in a folder with other photos and when i enlarged it was surprized to see this object. this has been stored for over a year and i am not trying to prove anything. just want some feedback on what it might be. i took the picture over my neighbor's house toward dallas county near the small town of sachse.It was west so.West from where i live. it was overcast so there should have been no sun shadow.When i first noticed it i thought how did that button get there!
content.summary: Circle object in clear sky with a deep shadow under it or propellant thrust

content.detailedDescription: I was in naples maine at sebage cove melody ln off shawhill for the weekend of june 18 sunday morrning at 3 am i awoke from a sound sleep. there was a bright ball low in the sky it was moving slow at frist and no sound. it was moving south going down gore rd towards 114 it was bright like a star it started slowing down then stoped. then went to the left at a high speed.About 16 sec had past then it went back to the right. then started moving forward againfor about15 sec. then it stoped again a light came from this ball it  lit up core rd like the sun again for abour 15 sec then it took off towards the moon no trail or sound.
content.summary: It was bright like a star had no sound and moving to slow

content.detailedDescription: 5 of us sitting outside on our patio watching a fire.  my spouse saw it first.  it just appeared out of no where. i got up and looked at it.  very close in the sky.  i knew it was a plane, no lights blinking and not moving.  triangular red/orange color lights motionless in sky.  i walked away from the fire to get a better look.  it took off very fast to the nw horizon.  no sound, no blinking lights.  but moved very fast.
content.summary: Triangular bright red/orange lights; no blinking; looked like circular lights of a taillight of a cadillac.  moved very fast to nw horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I just came back from dinner with my girlfriend at her apartment in bayridge brooklyn, around 6:30 pm. she did not feel so well so we went to the bedroom to lay down. around 6:45 - 7pm a storm was coming in and my bedroom window was open. i get up to close the window, and i look out the window and see what appears to be a blimp floating about 300 - 400 feet above the buildings 1-2 blocks away. about the size of a cue ball in my view. my 1st reaction was " what are these guys crazy?, flying this low in brooklyn?, i hope they are ok" about 5 seconds later, it was slowly heading in my direction and thats when i got a real good look at it and said to myself i can't be seeing this! i saw what appeared to be a stingray fish looking blimp! it was porclin white with a bright orange boarder, like a decal or some kind of sticker boarder. a light glowing reddish orange mist? around the ship and a metallic looking ball (orb)in the center. it was floating so gracefully, like it didnt have a care in the world. it truly was a beautiful craft. as it got a little closer i noticed it was moving back and forth, in lets say feet to where it was. and out from my right a dark small storm cloud about the size of the craft, came towards the craft fast and within approx 50 feet, a thick bluish orange bolt came out and hit the metal orb and it made a bright flash and just dissapeared! at that point i jumped back thinking that the craft has just expolded, expecting parts to be all over the streets below. after i kept looking and seen no trace of it, thats when i realized it just vanished from my point of view. right before the cloud came in, it acted like it was waiting for the bolt or like fine tuning a radio station. or like harpooning a fish. when the bolt hit, it made a hollow bursting sound. at that point i started to freak out knowing that what i just saw was real and i was not just seeing lights in the sky. i mean it was daylight out and right in front of my eyes! my girlfriend jumps out of bed from her relaxed state, sees me shaking and repeating myself over and over again "oh my god!" she says i am scaring her and what was that sound? i thought she was asleep and when she said that, i felt somewhat relieved knowing that atleast she heard that! i told her that i just seen a ufo and it just vanished and the sound she heard was it getting hit by a bolt of lightning! she calmed me down and she looked worried knowing me for 12 years never seen me so dumbfounded. i was in complete shock. always imagined it would be an experience at night, all the way up in the sky, with blinking colored lights like everyone always describes. never would i have thought it would be like this!!! i figured someone else had to have seen it. so around 10 pm after i somewhat calmed down, i am on my way to the pizzaria and i see in the sky above my head, in front of my building about 800 - 1000 ft 1 white orb flying by fast but smooth. following it was 1 black orb and 2 more white orbs in a triangle formation. at this point i am really starting to hit a point where i felt like i was dreaming or in a twilight zone and this was not happening. i mean 2 encounters in 1 evening? i felt like if next they were gonna land and it would be all over the news! seemed like there must have been up there all night. so i walk fast to the pizzaria to see a friend who works there and quietly asked him, if he hears of any stories of a craft above the buildings to let me know. he freaked out and told me to tell his co workers. when i did they looked at him with eyes wide! he told me that a week prior in bensonhurst, he seen the same exact craft i seen and described it exactly. says he got abused by his co workers telling him if et comes tell him we give him a free pie on the house! ridiculed all week long. now we were like little kids telling our story back and forth with relief and excietment. he also mentioned a close encounter when he lived in italy both he and his brother had. where they both seen a triangle craft. but he heard a noise and his brother didnot. this seemed to bother him. says it so confused. but we both felt a huge relief that we actually seen the same craft and no longer will he be made fun of! says no one believed him. i told him that i wouldnt have either! until that 25 second time of my life i was a skeptic. i did research on google to find that brooklyn is a hotbed for ufo activity. never would i have thought that such a populated area would be so happening with ufo activity. i cant stop looking out my window thinking i will see another ufo again. everywhere i go, i look up. hopeing i will see another to show people, and maybe someone in her neighborhood will see me and figure out why i am looking up. i don't want to ask anyone, thinking everyone will think i am crazy or on drugs. i also called 9-11 asking if anything was reported? nothing, so i asked them to report this. her tone of voice was like, go to bed. it has been about a week now and my girlfriend says i am obsessing over this. i can't help but be totally wanting answers that i know i wont get. strange how basically a 25 sec exp could change your life in a strange way! also note that the sunday it happened, most people in that neighborhood went away for 4th of july weekend, which cut the number of witnesses probably in half. but i still feel someone had to have seen it as well. there are still alot of people around where it was floating. i don't know what to make of this. but i do know what i saw, and will never forget that day. and the moment plays in my mind like a broken record. from that day on, i will always be a skywatcher!
content.summary: Beautiful porclin white craft floats above bayridge brooklyn buildings in daylight!

content.detailedDescription: We were living 4 miles west of downtown kokomo at the time.  around 7pm we saw a large object out our library window.  we went outside and saw a large object moving due south but slightly southeast of our subdivision.  it was moving very slowly and had a tremendous roar of a jet engine, but it did not look like any conventional military aircraft. (i grew up an air force brat.)  my wife and i both used the term "battlestar galactica" to describe the undersurface of this huge triagular object.  it seemed to be no highter than 500 feet.  my wife thought it was hovering and then took off at the speed of light but i think it was just slow moving and got lost because of the low altitude.  we called the local authorities thinking it was something new from grissom air force base, but were told if it was flying less than 1000 feet, someone was in big trouble.  i know it wasn't the stealth bomber because i had seen this and it wasn't the stealth.  i know classic ufos do not make jet engine roars but this thing did.  it has always been an enigma to me because i have never seen anything like it before or since.  i am reporting now because of other people reporting low-flying triangular shaped objects.  oh, my reaction was not one of fear but "what in the h*** is that?"  i guess i was not afraid because of the jet engine sound which was deafening.
content.summary: Slow moving battlestar galactica

content.detailedDescription:
All the below incidents have taken place in nabada kottiyahena area.

incident 1:
a young girl named piyumi kaushalya went outside of her house in the evening and saw a 2ft tall humanoid figure standing near the well. "it seemed to write something and when i talked it ran away and got down to a paddy field. it disapeared after yellow, blue lights flashed on top of its head" kaushalya says.Two weeks prior to this incident her mother had seen a 3 bright red colored objects in the eastern sky.

incident 2:
d.D. kusumawathi and six other people went to a jungle , marshy land sort of area in the evening in order to see the creatures (humanoid). "other people were about 20ft behind me and suddenly i smelled somthing burning...When i looked around i saw this brownish redish face with red glowing eyes looking at me...The red color in its eyes was rotating. i was looking at it for a while and screamed. i felt like my head was going to explode and i fainted" says kusumawathi.

incident 3:
chamila prashadini and two of her friends walked into the wooded area hoping to see the creatures. she had a similar experience as d.D. kusumawathi and also says she heard a humming sound. also people have heard a humming sound in the evenings from marshy wooded areas of the village


c
content.summary: In the small village nabada kotiyahena  area villagers had seen a 2ft tall beings

content.detailedDescription: I took this photo this morning(7/8/2006) about 8:45 am. the camera was pointed in a southerly direction. i was in the field in front of my house.
content.summary: Dark streak photographed in clear daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: Some neighbours were sitting around outside yapping july 7/06, when around 10pm one of them noticed what appeared to be a star, twinkling on the east-side of the moon. it was stationary, but looked to be twinkling red. we got out some decent binoculars & it looked to be flashing red/green & perhaps white....Predominately red flashes were seen. we called it a night around 11pm & it was still happening. anyone have an idea what this was? there was 6 of us & we all seen the same thing, so craziness should be ruled out. sorry, no photos were taken.
content.summary: Stationary flashing lights,

content.detailedDescription: While walking our horses into the barn, my wife and i were walking from our small out barn to the main barn (pretty dark out) when we both noticed what we thought was a satteite going by overhead. but this object was flashing (this would even seem inaccurate, it was more like what a distant lighthouse would seem to do with the light dimming and gaining and then dimming again) each flash was about second apart.It appeared to moving at a south to north path at a pretty good speed and crossed arcturus then went towards ursa major. as this object arrived at alkaid, another flash appeared just below alioth. the object then went towards this second (stationary flash) then both seemed to stop flashing and were not seen again. my wife and were both still standing there waiting for the object for 5 minutes before we realised we were getting cold and bitten by the bugs
content.summary: Flasher going acrross sky matching with a stationary flasher then both vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
i admit the possibility that i viewed an airliner, at low altitude, as it disappeared into a cloud bank. this said, i am a high time pilot. i am familair with illusions of flight and i found everything about this viewing experience as odd!
 i was turning onto a heavily trafficked road heading west. as i turned right, at a four way intersection, a bright reflection caught my attention off to my left. the object was likely 1 mile distant, to the south, at an altitude of around 4,000 feet. i think it was heading west. i thought the object was unusually bright, even compared to an airliner with a completely unpainted surface; the light was sparkling. i also had difficulty focusing on the craft as i tried to determine what was so peculiar about what i was seeing. i kept an eye on the craft for about 10 seconds. i was so momentarily distracted, because of the traffic, that when i looked back within seconds the craft disappeared. it didn't appear to be traveling at a speed that would have hidden it in a cloud bank at the moment that i was distracted. it was as if it blinked out of view! another oddity was that its relationship to the local airport was not consistent with normal arriving and departing flights. it was too large to be an overflight. it was the size of the craft that made me think airliner, but all other indications seemed other than an airliner.
 i continued looking back in the direction of the craft for a considerable amount of time without a recurring sighting.
content.summary: A brilliantly, reflective, flat looking,  craft that  was apparent and then suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving
2. the fact that it was just hovering and the speed when it took off
3. fireworks
4. it was bright orange like a sunset except on the bottom, where it was electric blue. it emitted a sparkly shower from its rear, probably it engines. it seemed to flood itself with the shower and disappear into nothingness.
5. it jogged my memory about when my father saw a similar one in 2003.
6. it seemed to flood itself with the shower and disappear into nothingness.
content.summary: Ufo seen

content.detailedDescription: We were in our backyard waiting to see the space shuttle/space station at approximately 9:21p.M.The channel 7 news/weather stated it would be seen at 9:22p.M. from the chicago area.  my husband, daughter, and myself were looking up to the sky waiting for the shuttle to come into view. my husband said there is the shuttle.  i said,"no that can't be it because they said it would be moving from right to left towards the moon, and shouldn't be blinking.This object came from left to right.As it moved from east to west it turned south. this seemed to take about 5 seconds,before it disappeared.Just then the shuttle was spotted by all present, moving from west to east moving towards the moon.Just as described on channel 7(local news and weather).We realized then the rate of speed of the blinking object appeared 10 times faster than the shuttle. this blinking object appeared to cross the path of the shuttle right before the shuttle came into view.
content.summary: A flashing object which traveled east to west at a very fast rate of speed,turning south sharply.  this was seen for maybe 2 seconds then nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
I first met the e.T. after they tranformed a large cloud
directly over my head. though the wind was blowing the cloud no longer moved and stayed motionless above me. the
20 meter by 20 meter cloud about 100 ft above took the shape of an bald headed humanoid looking extra-terrestrial.
looked down upon me and was very well defined. looking up at this, though surprizing, it was even more surprizing when the lips and mouth stated silently that he was an extra-terrestrial. i did'nt hear but could see completely,
they were able to communicate with me without words.
i mean they because he was not alone. many clouds then transformed into an array of extra-terrestrial beings standing up and hanging outside of their spacecraft(cloud)
manipulating the clouds telepathically, simplistically.\
it was a grand show and it has'nt stopped there.
i have been in communiction with more than one extra-terrestrial race for almost nine years.

i am tired of being quiet.
also one race of extra-terrestrials that are living here on earth and maybe right next door to you look just like
humans. that is one of the main reasons (of many) why
big brother likes to keep a lid. 

these look alikes and i don't get along to well, they are still somewhat covert and they're exact identitiies are not known by me at this time,  but, my other extra-terrestrial friends know who every body is.

the federal government will be told of this e- mail by these. i will send more later . i know many aliens.
content.summary: They manipulted the cloud canopy, multiple clouds at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on rt 20 in painesville apx 3-3;30 pm and saw bright white shape in sky travling real slow.Ive seen plenty of blimps before but this was real bright.I got goosebumps because i couldnt figure it out , it was so high.Was gunna pull over but i had to get my kids at home. im sure plenty of people saw it. i want to know what it was and if faa confirmed blimp today. but nuthing going on so i cant see why there would be one!
content.summary: White blimp shaped object high in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up @ 1:10 am - no special reason, i often do.  looked out the window, i have a nice view of the neighborhood and sky.  (this is coincidential, i'm sure, but... noticed flash lights checking out one of the houses under construction near mine.  soon a police car pulled up and another police officer joined in the search.  i turned on my porch/front lights and watched them search.  i didn't see anything and apparently they didn't either.  went back upstairs to my room (after turning off the lights) and just watched the sky.  the moon wasn't viewable from my window and there was a light haze in the sky, so only the brighter stars were visible.  then what appeared to be a satellite can into sight.  i watched it; it stopped.  i thought i may have lost sight of it, but no, it was still there.  then it started to move to the left, right, back, stayed in place, but never moved far from where it stopped.  the movements were jerky arcs with sudden stops.  after watching it for a while, wondering what the heck it was, i knocked off back to bed.

i've spend a good deal of time checking out satellite, iss, space shuttle, etc., locations and have found nothing that was scheduled to be in the sky this morning.  i'm waiting for the local weather station (noaa) to accept calls this afternoon to ask for weather balloon launches.

i did wake up my fiance and she did see it - but she wasn't too interested.

my actions/reactions are nothing really to speak of... i doubt i will ever find out what it was, but i'm going to keep my eyes open.

i did call the local police dept. for a report of the incident.  they said an officer saw something so they investigated and found nothing.
content.summary: Tracked like a satellite then stopped, then moved irregularly in a small area

content.detailedDescription: I looked out the window at approx. 9:00pm, as i heard fireworks.  i saw a samll red dot high in the sw sky.  it became increasingly larger and brighter, as if it were descending.  my wife thought it was a meteorite falling; i thought it was a missile; we both thought it was heading straight for our backyard!  once the red object reached its closest distance, it was far brighter than jupiter, which was also in the sky.  its brilliance resembled that of the planet venus when its closest to earth, only it was red and even larger than venus.  it stayed in place for several minutes; that's when we ruled out any type of aircraft.  it then began to slowly move in a se direction.  i went inside to get my camera.  when i came back a couple minutes later, it seemed to have moved quite a bit.  it was now in the se sky with the same brilliant red color.  it stayed in that spot for a few minutes, then began to ascend farther and farther away.  its ascent was similar to its descent, and eventually, it was too small to notice.  the whole event was so fantastic, i lost all interest in fireworks.  it was incredible.  i would describe it as a "once in a lifetime event."
content.summary: Red object in night sky more brilliant than venus in its finest hour.

content.detailedDescription:
I shoot some video on june 29th at 9:30pm of 2 flying rods and with the 
movement of the second on the footage i may be the first to have filmed them.

there are 2 rods in the video the first comes up from the ground and bends around the phone line above.
the second is the best it comes in from a horiziontal pattern then in front of the camera stops and the backside of it swings into a different position then 
takes the lead in that other direction, amazing!
i was filming trying to capture lightning from a storm to the west of my home and this is what i caught.

the camera was a sony handycam hcr-dvd105 using manual focus and super nightshot plus mounted on a tripod.
i just bought the camera that day (not kidding)and this was my first video and i was lucky enough to capture this footage.
the video has to be slowed down to see the backend swing into that next 
position.
hopefully i have discovered maybe a new entity or a real rod and this clearly 
shows its not an insect.
i saved the original mini dvd in case someone wants to examine it.
content.summary: Nighttime rods or new entity video

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking outside on my porch, looking at the stars in the southeastern sky with my hubsand.  i noticed a dull (in color) yellowish light about 30 degrees above the horizon.It was a duller yellow than a streetlight, and was about three times brighter than jupiter. it was stationary and did not look like a planet or plane lights, as the lights of a plane are more of crisp white light. i went inside and got a pair of binoculars and returned outside.  the light had moved a bit towards the west and was still in the south-south eastern sky.  it had also gotten lower on the horizon by this time.  i got sight of it in the binoculars and saw a disc shaped object with several circular shaped windows, which the yellow light was emanating out of.  on top of the craft was a small blinking white light.  i ran inside and grabbed the phone to call a nearby friend who lived in town. i returned outside as i dialed and saw the object moving lower on the horizon and headed south going quickly headed towards highway 287. by the time she got on the phone, the object had disappeared low on the horizon in the southern sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dull (in color)  yellow light sighted in southeastern sky
